metadata.title: CVE-2018-6389 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: In WordPress through 4.9.2, unauthenticated attackers can cause a denial of service (resource consumption) by using the large list of registered .js files (from wp-includes/script-loader.php) to construct a series of requests to load every file many times.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
